data.text: @MKapombe Hi, just a quick question, are you a feminist?

@MKapombe Men SHOULD be apologetic. They should at least note that they are in a more advantageous position and just by simply existing they get to experience certain privileges that women don’t get to.
@MKapombe I am angered by events that we have been doing as men this entire week and we just need to say it as it is...:

@MKapombe Thomas Sankara articulated this ideal best.“The revolution& women’s liberation go together:We dont talk of women’s emancipation as an act of charity or out of a surge of human compassion.Its a basic necessity for the revolution to triumph.Women hold up the other half of the sky”.
@MKapombe The patriarchal world is a male centered one, never forget that. Everything, from politics to business to even professional cooking, is male dominated.

At the end of the webinar, participants agreed that gender  inequality and unpaid care work are not only African issues but global issues. They called on donors and governments to ensure accountability in the use of funds meant for advancing gender equality. #LastingChange
